item.title: Improve async code with Promise.all()
item.description: Javascript have very powerful asynchronous feature async/await that help us to write asynchronous code in a synchronous way so that we can easily understand the code.
item.content:encoded:
Javascript have very powerful asynchronous feature async/await that help us to write asynchronous code in a synchronous way so that we can easily understand the code.

However, If you don't pay attention to your code, it can perform inefficiently.
item.author: juckmyeol0716@gmail.com (Yongjoon Lee)
